transcript: I don't know like four o'clock this morning I heard a crack and I woke up and I looked out the window and you're standing right there when it broke.

segments.text: I don't know like four o'clock this morning I heard a crack and I woke up and I looked
out the window and you're standing right there when it broke.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know, like, four o'clock this morning.  I heard a crack, and I woke up, and I looked out the window and he was standing right there when it broke.
